description.signal: "Date: " + (isValid(datum["Date"]) ? datum["Date"] : ""+datum["Date"]) + "; Sum of Total: " + (format(datum["sum_Total"], "")) + "; BillingCountry: " + (isValid(datum["BillingCountry"]) ? datum["BillingCountry"] : ""+datum["BillingCountry"])

tooltip.signal: {"Date": isValid(datum["Date"]) ? datum["Date"] : ""+datum["Date"], "Sum of Total": format(datum["sum_Total"], ""), "BillingCountry": isValid(datum["BillingCountry"]) ? datum["BillingCountry"] : ""+datum["BillingCountry"]}
